name: As above, so below
description:
This principle contains the truth that there is always one
Correspondence between laws and appearances
on the various plans of being and life there. The old
Hermetic axiom reads: "As above, so below; as below, so
above. "Grasping this principle gives us the means to
Solution of many dark and hidden paradoxes
Natural secrets. There are plans beyond ours
Cognition; but if we apply the principle of
Applying correspondence, we can understand a lot about us
otherwise it would remain unrecognizable.

Handsigned
2500 x 3000
